name: Theme Songs
overview: Automatically downloads theme songs for your media
description: Download theme songs for movies and shows automatically. This plugin integrates with your Jellyfin media library to fetch and organize theme songs for your favorite content.

versions.changelog:
- Add initial plugin entry to `manifest.json` with Theme Songs plugin details (87bffb5)
- Update README.md with placeholder content (5e4df35)
- Add `manifest.json` as part of the project configuration files (e27c435)
- Enhance publish workflow with detailed comments and improved manifest update process using `jq`. (ade94e8)
- Simplify publish workflow by removing redundant comments and updating branch reference (369ea44)
- Update publish workflow to improve artifact handling and manifest update process (d991652)
- Set up project scaffolding with build pipeline configuration and release workflow (f453f4d)
